snippet.title: The Flayed Man Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM NOW!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3471670/The_Flayed_Man/

The Flayed Man is a FREE upcoming point and click horror game that will be released on the 17th April 2025. You are the Flayed Man. Awaking in a decayed, otherworldly house where your every waking moment is agony, you must uncover the sins of the past, pass judgement, and decide your fate in this unsettling, macabre adventure.
